abstract: Lagardere said it will start the process for an initial public offering of its 20 percent stake in pay-television company Canal Plus France, after failing to reach an agreement to sell the holding to Vivendi, Bloomberg News reported.
snippet: Lagardere said it will start the process for an initial public offering of its 20 percent stake in pay-television company Canal Plus France, after failing to reach an agreement to sell the holding to Vivendi, Bloomberg News reported.
lead_paragraph: Lagardère said it would start the process for an initial public offering of its 20 percent stake in the  pay-television company Canal Plus France, after failing to reach an agreement to sell the holding to Vivendi, Bloomberg News reported.

headline.main: Lagardére to Begin Canal Plus I.P.O.
